title.narrative: LIVELIHOOD, ACCESS TO LAND AND WATER

description.narrative:
Oxfam Programme ID PROG010132
The overall impact goal for this programme will be achieved through the following strategic interventions.
Advocacy for and supporttothe revision of the legal frameworks around EI related revenue sharing, community rights, access to informationand the renegotiation of various EI contracts based on open access to relevant information and EI data.
Improved understanding and capacity by communities and civil society on EI issues to enable advocacy for frameworks that facilitate various forms of engagement in the EI value chain by communities in line with their rights
Enforcement of Environmental, Sustainability and Impact Assessments(including assessment of human rights/ gender impacts) and ensure they are accessible and disseminated in simplified language.
Promoting the exchange of goodpractices and buildingthe capacity of CSOs to advocate for human rights at a local, regional and global level by linking them to regional and global learning

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
